With Theo Ratliff on the injured list and Matt Geiger suspended, Allen Iverson outplayed Kobe Bryant and the 76ers used a platoon of reserve centers to deal with Shaquille O'Neal en route to an impressive 112-97 victory over the Los Angeles Lakers. We knew we were outmatched. We didn't have two of our big men, but we just knew we had to come out and play some ball, Allen Iverson said after scoring 40 points and handing out nine assists in 40 minutes. Allen Iverson hit 14-of-29 shots and 10-of-11 free throws to reach 40 points for the seventh time in his last 11 games and the 11th time

duck and see what hatches!" he tells another. That's apparently his version of a compliment. Toby Young remains amused by the idea that Americans need a mean Brit to tell it like it is. It's funny because 75 years ago Americans had a reputation for being honest and plainspoken, while Brits were thought to be mealy-mouthed and obsessed with propriety, says Toby Young . "It's as if we've switched places." But with Simon Cowell gone, who's going to judge our nation of underachievers? AEvangelista at 12:06 AM January 19, 2011

adult daughters. This was in the wake of the killing of Uday Hussein and Qusay Hussein by American troops in July 2003. Here's the passage from Donald Rumsfeld 's "Known and Unknown": After his sons were killed, there was an intelligence report that Saddam Hussein was paying$ 60 million for his agents to target the President Bush 's two daughters and my two daughters for reprisal attacks. That threat report was brought up at an NSC meeting in October 2003. I acknowledged it, but went on with our discussion. "You need to take this seriously," President Bush said.
